sentences.en: After a year in ashen Paris, he was in a chromatic delirium.
sentences.cn: 在灰白的巴黎住了一年后, 梵谷在这里陷入著色的欣狂.

sentences.en: All is in a delirium of change.
sentences.cn: 什么事物都在火热的转变之中.

sentences.en: Before she died she had fits of delirium.
sentences.cn: 去世前她一阵阵地胡言乱语。

sentences.en: Delirium Tremens is No. one beer a Belgian lager beer.
sentences.cn: 哦,一小杯啤酒——某种淡啤酒就行.

sentences.en: Every time her power of struggling against the growing delirium grew fainter and fainter.
sentences.cn: 每经过一次挣扎,她对于胡言乱语的抵抗就削弱一次.

sentences.en: In her delirium, she had fallen to the floor several times.
sentences.cn: 她在神志不清的状态下几次摔倒在地上。

sentences.en: Later, mental abnormalities may include nervousness, depression, and delirium.
sentences.cn: 较晚会出现精神障碍症状, 可能包括紧张 、 抑郁和精神错乱.

sentences.en: Life creates itself in delirium and is undone in ennui.
sentences.cn: 生活因谵妄而兴盛,因倦怠而荒芜.

sentences.en: Mental dullness is prominent, and delirium may occur.
sentences.cn: 神志迟钝加甚, 且可发生谵妄.

sentences.en: Oh, how oppressive this continual delirium is.
sentences.cn: 啊, 这种连续的昏迷是多么痛苦啊!

sentences.en: She passed a part of the night in delirium and raving.
sentences.cn: 她在昏迷中大声叫喊,胡言乱语,闹了大半夜.

sentences.en: The Don spoke quietly gravely to pierce through the blasphemous delirium.
sentences.cn: 堂安静地、阴沉地说,穿过这不敬的胡说.

sentences.en: The evening was no longer joy, but delirium.
sentences.cn: 所以当天傍晚阿尔贝得意洋洋地回来了,他不单是高兴, 简直有点要热昏了头.

sentences.en: The postoperative delirium was recorded and the influential factors were analyzed.
sentences.cn: 对术后发生谵妄的病例研究其影响因素.

sentences.en: They asked me for quotes and my current state of delirium.
sentences.cn: 他们问我有什么感言?是否很亢奋?

words.tran_cn: 发狂的；神志昏迷的；精神错乱的
精神错乱；发狂，狂热；说谵语状态

trans.tran_cn: 谵妄，神志昏迷，极度兴奋，（因酒精中毒引起的）震颤性谵妄
